text: @NYGovCuomo All these negative Nancy's.  We need NY reopened!  CoVid-19 is over! If you don't feel safe, stay at home!  The rest of us want our lives back. AND no a vaccine isn't goibg to make it go away either. https://t.co/fWFTc9QSNb
